attributes.action: forster park wont allow parents to say goodbye in the playground.
attributes.additional_details: The primary school has now given way to a new rule that states parents are not allowed through the main school gate at 8.45am to take their children to there class and say goodbye. Some of these children are only 4 years old. Please sign the petition to allow parents into the school grounds, if the children start the day unhappy they wont learn much at school. Hopefully we can change this.
